name: chilecon
description: A professional, projector-optimized presentation for the qWard quantum computing toolkit.

scripts.build: npm run copy:files && npm run copy:reveal
scripts.copy:files: cp index.html dist/ && cp *.css dist/ && cp *.js dist/ && cp *.png dist/ 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.copy:reveal: mkdir -p dist/node_modules/reveal.js && cp -r node_modules/reveal.js/dist dist/node_modules/reveal.js/ && cp -r node_modules/reveal.js/plugin dist/node_modules/reveal.js/

author: Cristian Marquez
